Item 5.03 Amendments to Articles of           
Incorporation or Bylaws; Change in Fiscal     
Year. On November 10, 2021, The Goldman Sachs 
Group, Inc. (the “Company”) filed a Restated  
Certificate of Incorporation with the         
Secretary of State of the State of Delaware   
reflecting the prior filing of the Company’s  
Certificate of Designations to the Restated   
Certificate of Incorporation with the         
Secretary of State of the State of Delaware   
setting forth the terms of its 4.125% Fixed-  
Rate Reset Non-CumulativePreferred Stock,     
Series V. A copy of the Restated Certificate  
of Incorporation is listed as Exhibit 3.1 to  
this Current Report on Form 8-Kand is         
incorporated herein by reference. Item 9.01   
Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d)        
Exhibits The following exhibits are filed as  
part of this Current Report on Form 8-K:      
                                              
         Restated Certificate of              
         Incorporation of The Goldman Sachs   
         Group, Inc., amended as of November  
  3.1    10, 2021.
